16  bool _fmodule;

21 typedef std::string vlg_name_t;
22 typedef std::string vlg_stmt_t;
23 typedef std::string vlg_addr_t;
24 typedef std::string vlg_data_t;

31 typedef std::pair<vlg_name_t, vlg_sigs_t>
32  vlg_per_mem_access_t; // intended for embedded memory (not external memory)
33 
34 typedef std::tuple<vlg_name_t, int, int>
35  vlg_mem_t; // name addr_width data_width
36 typedef std::vector<vlg_mem_t> vlg_mems_t;
37 
38 // This is an individual write.
39 struct mem_write_entry_t {
40  nptr_t addr;
41  nptr_t data;
42 };
43 // This is a list of writes.
44 typedef std::list<mem_write_entry_t> mem_write_entry_list_t;
45 typedef std::list<mem_write_entry_list_t> mem_write_entry_list_stack_t;
46 // This is the write and its associated condition.
47 struct mem_write_t {
48  nptr_t cond;
49  mem_write_entry_list_t writes;
50 };
51 // List of writes and associated conditions.
52 typedef std::list<mem_write_t> mem_write_list_t;
53 
54 std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& out, const mem_write_entry_t& mwe);
55 std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& out, const mem_write_entry_list_t& mwel);
56 std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& out,
57  const mem_write_entry_list_stack_t& mwel);
58 std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& out, const mem_write_t& mw);
59 std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& out, const mem_write_list_t& mwl);
